Name: ModOrganizer-to-OpenMW
Author: AnyOldName3
Description: A Mod Organizer plugin to export your VFS, plugin selection and load order to OpenMW.

ReleaseNotes: Automatically detect the location of openmw.cfg.
Check for updates automatically (in MO2 2.3.2 or later - a bug prevents this working in older releases).
Only show the menu item when the managed game is Morrowind.
Various developer-oriented improvements, including: VS Code integration. A build script & Code maintenance.
Translator-oriented improvements, including: Automatic upload of new strings to Transifex. Better use of format strings so I can change things in the future without requiring retranslation.
